query.result:
| Italian | Lemma | English | |---|---|---| | che | che | that | | li | il | the | | primi | primo | first | | parenti | parente | relative | | intrambo | intrambo | both | | fensi | fare | make |
Please note that "intrambo" is an archaic form of "entrambi", which means "both".
